transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Good afternoon ji main Ashutosh.
Good evening sir. Ji main Ashutosh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Sir maine aapko call ki thi aapne do teen baar call ki thi. Ha ha.
Ji ji ji main uska do se client ke sath. 550 aapka ye 550 aapka ye number hai kya last pe?
Ji ji.
Mai call karta hu aapko sir ka number hai mai us number se dusre number se call. 
Thik hai kariye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says he received calls from executive.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the customer's contact number.

- Customer will call back from another number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, contact number, indiaMART
